content.description: Let f be the function given by f(x)=|x|. Which of the following statements about f are true?
content.question: I. f is continuous at x=0. II. f is differentiable at x=0. III. f has an absolute minimum at x=0.

topic.text: 2.4: Connecting Differentiability and Continuity - Determining When Derivatives Do and Do Not Exist
